pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"FreeBSD 是一款功能完备的开源类 UNIX® 操作系统，以其卓越的稳定性、安全性和性能而著称。FreeBSD 项目由充满热忱的志愿者社区所开发。FreeBSD 基于伯克利软件发行版（Berkeley Software Distribution, BSD）UNIX 操作系统。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["FreeBSD 的 STABLE 镜像是开发版本，并非一般发行版意义上的“稳定版”，仅代表此大版本内 ABI 稳定，FreeBSD 官方不建议将其应用于生产环境。参见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://wiki.freebsd.org/Glossary#STABLE","rel":"nofollow","children":"FreeBSD Glossary STABLE"}],"。FreeBSD 传统意义上的稳定版是 RELEASE，FreeBSD 官方推荐将其用于生产环境。FreeBSD 的主线（main）开发版本称作 CURRENT。参见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://docs.freebsd.org/en/articles/freebsd-releng/","rel":"nofollow","children":"FreeBSD Release Engineering"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注：FreeBSD 基本系统致力于去 GNU 化，因此不含 sudo 等软件（用户可通过包管理器自行安装）。参见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://wiki.freebsd.org/GPLinBase","rel":"nofollow","children":"GPL Software in FreeBSD Base"}],"。"]}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":["pkg 和 ports 仓库已被官方移动到独立的仓库中。详见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/FreeBSD-pkg/","children":"FreeBSD pkg 帮助"}],"与 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/FreeBSD-ports/","children":"FreeBSD ports 帮助"}]]}]]}]
